summary: I love scimitars but hate how low damage they do so i made this fun scimtar(i had soo much fun with it) and i hope u guys do to if u like endorse :)
descriptionHtml:
Description:
I wanted a scimtar that was fun but tough so i made this really (cool and really fun to play with) Scimitar i hope u guys love it just give it a chance plz.

Story:
Before the dragons were gone they was once a man who made these dual swords to fend the dragons from his house but one day when he made them, he added the wrong ingredient and .... He was gone. You the new Dragonborn must complete hit job of defeated the dragons and end them for good.

Location:
Upstairs in BreezeHome next to your bed theres two.

Endorse:
I would really love it if u guys would endorse it so i know u guys care and i will retexture and i will take suggestions on what u think i should do, also i will soon be making a house so stay tuned!
author: SaddyDog
